name: Rush Limbaugh
title: Former Host of The Rush Limbaugh Show
summary: Rush Limbaugh was known for his distinctive bombastic delivery, deep resonant voice, theatrical emphasis, and characteristic phrases like 'talent on loan from God' and 'with half my brain tied behind my back.'
bio: Rush Limbaugh (1951-2021) was an American radio personality, conservative political commentator, author, and television show host. He was best known as the host of his radio show The Rush Limbaugh Show, which was nationally syndicated from 1988 until his death in 2021.
voiceCharacteristics: Deep, resonant voice with Midwestern accent
Bombastic, theatrical delivery with dramatic pauses
Frequent use of exaggerated emphasis and elongated words
Rapid shifts between serious and humorous tones

samples.title: Talent On Loan From God
samples.description: Classic Rush monologue with signature flourishes
samples.fullText: Folks, this is not complicated. The mainstream media won't tell you this, but I will. With half my brain tied behind my back just to make it fair. I am equal time. I am the epitome of morality and virtue. I am... the all-knowing, all-sensing, all-everything Maha Rushie!
